name: TupleHelpers
description: Helper contract to extract a variety of types from a tuple within the context of a weiroll script.

functionDecorators.name: extractArray
functionDecorators.description: Extract a bytes encoded static array from a tuple. Use with .rawValue() in the weiroll planner.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the array to be extracted.

functionDecorators.name: extractDynamicArray
functionDecorators.description: Extract a bytes encoded dynamic array from a tuple. Use with .rawValue() in the weiroll planner.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the dynamic array to be extracted.

functionDecorators.name: extractDynamicElement
functionDecorators.description: Extract a bytes encoded dynamic type from a tuple. Use with .rawValue() in the weiroll planner.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the string or bytes to be extracted.

functionDecorators.name: extractElement
functionDecorators.description: Extract a bytes32 encoded static type from a tuple. Use with .rawValue() in the weiroll planner.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the value to be extracted.

functionDecorators.name: extractTuple
functionDecorators.description: Extract a bytes encoded tuple from another tuple. Use with .rawValue() in the weiroll planner.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the tuple to be extracted.

parameterDecorators.name: isDynamicTypeFormat
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean to define whether the child tuple is dynamically sized. If the child tuple contains bytes or string variables, set to "true".

functionDecorators.name: extractTupleArray
functionDecorators.description: Extract a bytes encoded array of tuples from a tuple. Use with .rawValue() in the weiroll planner.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the tuple array to be extracted.

parameterDecorators.name: isDynamicTypeFormat
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean to define whether the tuples in the array are dynamically sized. If the array tuple contains bytes or string variables, set to "true".
